forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North northwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the night deepens into dawn, Downtown San Francisco rests under a serene cloak of clear air, its shores untroubled by fog. The crystal purity of the sky hints at a delightful transformation as the sun prepares to rise. On this December morning, the city will awaken to bright sunshine, with temperatures already hinting at a mild embrace of 49 degrees. As the day unfolds, expect the warmth to gently climb towards the low sixties, offering a comfortable respite from the chill that lingers in the early hours.

With a gentle wind whispering from the north northwest, it is an opportune moment for a quiet stroll along the waterfront or a visit to the vibrant corners of the city. Light layers will serve you well—perhaps a sweater to fend off the morning coolness paired with a light jacket for later. Breathe in the crispness of the air as it invites an exploration of local cafes, where the scent of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the promise of a clear, unblemished day ahead. Indulge in the city's charm, whether that means a leisurely visit to a gallery or the simple pleasure of watching the world move gently around you.
